mapper.select: select ucm.CAR_ID as carID, ucm.NUMBER as contractID, ucm.NAME as contractName, ucm.CONTRACT_TYPE as contractType, ucm.STATUS , ucid.collection from uctp_contract_management ucm left join uctp_car_info_details ucid on ucid.CAR_ID =ucm.CAR_ID where ucm.CAR_ID=#{carID}
select ubf.id as longId, ucm.number as contractID from uctp_contract_management ucm inner join uctp_business_file ubf on ucm.NUMBER =ubf.MAIN_ID where ucm.NUMBER =#{contractID}

select CAR_ID as carId ,CONTRACT_ID as contractId ,CONTRACT_NAME as contractName ,FIRST_PARTY as firstParty ,SECOND_PARTY as secondParty ,SIGN_UP_AMOUNT as signUpAmount ,STATUS ,CONTRACT_TYPE as contractType ,TENANT_ID as tenantId ,CREATOR ,CREATE_TIME as createTime ,SIGNING_DATE as signingDate ,UPDATER as updater ,UPDATE_TIME as updateTime ,BUSINESS_ID as businessId ,DELETED from uctp_contract where CAR_ID =#{carId} and CONTRACT_TYPE=#{contractType} and STATUS in('0','1','2')
